summary: The NSF AI Education Act of 2025 aims to promote artificial intelligence (AI) education and workforce development through the National Science Foundation (NSF). The bill focuses on student scholarships and fellowships, community college and area career/technical education center development, awards for research on AI in education, and an AI collaborative program. The legislation amends the National Artificial Intelligence Initiative Act of 2020 to support initiatives related to AI education, outreach, and professional development.
